name: Tesla's Alternator (Stateus)
description:
This was a simple game idea I remade. The idea is that you are Nikola Tesla, and with your Alternator, set out to defeat Edison once and for all. The game doesn't have an Edison bossfight yet (may be added in the future), but it's current state is a wave-based arcade game. 

I might add to this in the future. Enjoy.
